hydraulic_conductivity.helptext:
Hydraulic conductivity of the sediments. 
 This value will be used to calculate the water flux into the sediment layer as a result of changes in hydraulic head with the 
 overlying water or deeper sediment layers
hydraulic_conductivity.warningmessage: Hydraulic conductivity must be greater than zero

specific_storage.helptext:
Specific storage of the sediment layer. 
 This value will be used to calculate the hydraulic head in the sediment layer in case the water content is different than the porosity.
 The pressure head is calculated as p=(water_content-porosity)/specific_storage
specific_storage.warningmessage: Specific Storage must be greater than zero

bottom_elevation.helptext: Bottom elelvation of the sediment layer with respect to the model datum

depth.warningmessage: Cell depth must be greater than zero

water_content.helptext: Initial water content. In most cases the water content should be equal to the porosity of the sediment layer

length.helptext: Length of the sediment block. In most cases the length of the sediment block should be equal to the length of the block representing the overlying water
length.warningmessage: Element length must be greater than zero

width.helptext: Width of the sediment block. In most cases the length of the sediment block should be equal to the width of the block representing the overlying water
width.warningmessage: Element width must be greater than zero
